info.title: DJ Connect API
info.description: API documentation for DJ Connect. All requests must include header Telegram-Init-Data: ${TWA.initData()}

post.description: Registers a new DJ and returns the DJ object

payment_details.example: Bank details or any payment information
Bank details or any payment information

post.description: Allows a DJ to add a new track

put.description: Allows a DJ to update an existing track

delete.description: Allows a DJ to delete an existing track

get.description: Returns the list of tracks associated with a specific DJ

patch.description: Allows a DJ to update the price of a track

get.description: Retrieve various statistics for a DJ including total orders, total income, average price, etc.

get.summary: Generate QR code for DJ profile [web-server request]
get.description: Generates a QR code for a DJ's profile. Make sure to make request to web server, not api server!

delete.summary: Clear all DJs from the database
delete.description: Delete all DJ records from the database.

post.description: Allows a user to create an order for a track

patch.description: Allows a DJ to accept an order
Allows a DJ to decline an order
Allows a user to cancel an order and associated transactions

200.description: Order and associated transactions cancelled successfully

get.description: Returns the list of orders for a specific DJ
Returns the list of orders for the authenticated user

post.description: Allows a DJ to create a payout request in the database.

card_number.description: Bank card number, required if payout_type is bank_card

bank_id.description: Bank ID, required if payout_type is sbp

phone.description: Phone number, required if payout_type is sbp

account_number.description: YooMoney account number, required if payout_type is yoo_money

post.description: Allows an admin to approve a payout request and send it via YooKassa.

parameters.name: payoutId
parameters.description: ID of the payout to be approved

400.description: Invalid payout ID or payout already processed

get.description: Retrieves a list of banks and payment services connected to the SBP.

200.description: List of SBP participants retrieved successfully

get.summary: Get all payouts for a specific DJ
get.description: Fetches all payouts associated with a specific DJ from the database.

200.description: List of payouts for the DJ

patch.description: Allows a DJ to mark a transaction as paid
Allows a DJ to cancel a pending transaction

get.summary: Get a user's profile by Telegram ID
get.description: Returns the details of a specified user by their Telegram ID

get.summary: Get the current authenticated user's details
get.description: Returns the details of the authenticated user

post.description: Assign the 'admin' role to a user and update their email and password.

user_id.description: ID of the user to be updated

200.description: User updated and set as admin

is_paid.description: Is the order paid based on the transaction status

email_verified_at.description: Timestamp when the user's email was verified

is_dj.description: Indicates if the user is a DJ

payment_details.example: Bank details or any payment information

telegramAuth.name: Telegram-Init-Data
telegramAuth.description: Value of TWA.initData() from Telegram Web App.
